title: Bottle, late 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
description: Iin shape, a polygonal cylinder, bevelled at each end, with flat shoulders leading to necks.  Ends fitted with gold-plated collars with pancake-shaped covers of larger diameter than collars but less than body of the bottle.  One cover hinged. Glass divider across center of cylinder is a thick wall of glass. Monogrammed on end, "E. A. T." in interlaced letters.
